actions.recommendation: A healthy gut is associated with more diverse bacteria residing in our gut achieved through a varied diet, rich in nutrients and based on plants and whole foods. Fast food, processed foods, preservatives, and food additives harm our gut microbiome.

PSA testing: annually, from age 40 if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45: if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side.From age 50: every 2 years
